verses.roman:
'mālajāṭhyā-daṇḍapāṭe' tāra adhikāra
sādhi' pāḍi' āni' dravya dila rāja-dvāra

synonyms: mālajāṭhyā-daṇḍapāṭe—in the place known as Mālajāṭhyā Daṇḍapāta; tāra—his; adhikāra—authority; sādhi'-soliciting; pāḍi'-collecting; āni'-bringing; dravya—the money; dila—gave; rāja-dvāra—to the door of the King.
translation: "He served in the place known as Mālajāṭhyā Daṇḍapāta, soliciting and collecting money there and depositing it in the government treasury.
